**Example**

```esql
row x = "2024-01-01"::datetime | eval y = x + "3 DAYS"::date_period, z = x - to_dateperiod("3 days");
```

| --- | --- | --- |
| 2024-01-01 | 2024-01-04 | 2023-12-29 |
